We’d love to hear from you

Whether you’re curious about our event services, keen to discuss sustainability and partnerships, or even just have a general enquiry, we’d love to hear from you.

Chat with us

Book a time that suits you and share your event plans with us

Or email us

Send message

By clicking on “Send message” button, you agree to our Privacy Policy,

On Purpose events is a sustainable event management company. We help businesses, associations and government on a path toward carbon neutral meetings and events with lasting positive impact. Together we can create a better future, one event at a time.
